name: Knight's Grid
description:
Welcome to Knight's Grid, a game created for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam by Science Fair Games!

The player has been cursed with linked movement that mimics the Knight! You will have to use your switches carefully to navigate through the levels.

Goal

  • Walk over the green teleport tile (passing the teleport tile using any 3 of your moves will complete the level)
  • There is one open stage and 5 levels to complete

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys --> Movement
    • The inputted key will move you two spaces, the linked movement will automatically move one space
  • C --> Rotate move link dial (3 rotations per stage)
  • R --> Restart stage
